topic.fullpath: Topic :: Formats and Protocols :: Data Formats

name: Sayonara
short_description: Sayonara is an attempt at making the simplest, most powerful, programming language ever with no learning curve. If you know the basics of the English language (And some other languages!) you can use Sayonara. With Sayonara you type what you want it to do, also known as TWYM. (Type What You Mean) Sayonrara processes this and tries to do the best it can to interpret what you typed.
summary: A literal programming language where you type what you mean.
